template.description: fix del collegamento tra processori per il reinvio dei dati di dpcn via amqp
template.name: INGEST CSV DPC to DBALLE - 2025-07-07

labels.label: ATTENZIONE: In DEV si deve eliminare il collegamento tra "convert jsonlinetobufr" e "change delivery mode"

entry.value: E0009b: Non stato possibile aggiornare log FILE.
update public.dpcn_logfile set ts_errore = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000), ms_errore = '${messaggio:replace("'","''")}' where fileid = ${fileid.0};

entry.value: E009: Errore nell'inserimento dei dati di anagrafica su DB.
E007: Non stato possibile svuotare la tabella di anagrafica.

labels.label: Old processors for PLUVIO sensor, with (flawed) measurements aggregations for timeranges < 15 min

entry.value:
-- Raffica select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 2::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 3600::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B11041'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%m/s%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 1)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 103::integer as level1, 10000::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'Raffica'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - RAFFICA

entry.value:
-- Dir_Ven select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 254::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 0::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B11001'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 0)::double precision when (lower(ana.uom) like '%degrees%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 0)::double precision when (lower(ana.uom) like '%gradi%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 0)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 103::integer as level1, 10000::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'DIR_VEN'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - DIR_VEN

entry.value:
-- Nivo select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 254::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 0::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B13013'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%cm%') then round(dat.misura::numeric/ 100, 3)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 1::integer as level1, null::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'Nivo'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - NIVO

entry.value:
-- Idro select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 254::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 0::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B13215'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%m%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 2)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 1::integer as level1, null::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'Idro'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - IDRO

entry.value:
-- Pluvio >= 15min with inner_dat as ( select dat.db, dat.sensore, (to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp at time zone 'UTC') as date from public.dpcn_dati dat join public.dpcn_anagrafica ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0}
-- SENSORETIPO and ana.sensoretipo = 'Pluvio'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}' ) select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 1::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, freq_min::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B13011'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%mm%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 1)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 1::integer as level1, null::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join public.dpcn_anagrafica ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db join ( select db, sensore, min(freq_min) as freq_min from ( select dat.db, dat.sensore, extract(epoch from dat.date - max(dat_prec.date)) as freq_min from inner_dat dat left join inner_dat dat_prec on dat.db = dat_prec.db and dat.sensore = dat_prec.sensore and dat_prec.date < dat.date where dat_prec.date is not null group by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.date ) foo group by db, sensore having min(freq_min) >= 900 ) frq on frq.sensore = dat.sensore and frq.db = dat.db
where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - PLUVIO > 15 min

entry.value:
-- Atm_Pre select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 254::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 0::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B10004'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%hpa%') then round(dat.misura::numeric * 100, -1)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 1::integer as level1, null::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'ATM_PRE'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - ATM_PRE

entry.value:
-- Termo select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, --'dpcn-test' as network, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 254::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 0::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B12101'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%c%') then round(dat.misura::numeric + 273.15, 2)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 103::integer as level1, 2000::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'Termo'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

-- Igro select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 254::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 0::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B13003'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like E'%\%%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 0)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 103::integer as level1, 2000::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'Igro'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - IGRO

entry.value:
-- Vel_Ven select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 254::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 0::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B11002'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%km/h%') then round(dat.misura::numeric / 3.6, 1)::double precision when (lower(ana.uom) like '%m/s%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 1)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 103::integer as level1, 10000::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select * from public.dpcn_anagrafica where
-- SENSORETIPO sensoretipo = 'VEL_VEN'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
) ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999) order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - VEL_VEN

entry.value:
-- Pluvio (General) with inner_dat as ( select dat.db, dat.sensore, (to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp at time zone 'UTC') as date from public.dpcn_dati dat join public.dpcn_anagrafica ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0}
-- SENSORETIPO and ana.sensoretipo = 'Pluvio'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}'
-- only measurements at expected sampling rate and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9998) ) select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 1::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, freq_min::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B13011'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%mm%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 1)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 1::integer as level1, null::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from public.dpcn_dati dat join public.dpcn_anagrafica ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db join ( select db, sensore, min(freq_min) as freq_min from ( select dat.db, dat.sensore, extract(epoch from dat.date - max(dat_prec.date)) as freq_min from inner_dat dat left join inner_dat dat_prec on dat.db = dat_prec.db and dat.sensore = dat_prec.sensore and dat_prec.date < dat.date where dat_prec.date is not null group by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.date ) foo group by db, sensore ) frq on frq.sensore = dat.sensore and frq.db = dat.db
where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric >= 0 order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.giorno, dat.orarioutc;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - PLUVIO (general)

entry.value:
-- Pluvio < 15min with inner_dat as ( select dat.db, dat.sensore, (to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp at time zone 'UTC') as date from public.dpcn_dati dat join public.dpcn_anagrafica ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0}
-- SENSORETIPO and ana.sensoretipo = 'Pluvio'
-- NETWORK and 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) = '${network_name}' ) select ana.sensorenome as station_name, ana.alt as station_hmsl, null::varchar as ident, 'dpcn-' || lower(replace(replace(replace(regione,' ',''),'/',''),'-','')) as network, (round(ana.lon::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lon, (round(ana.lat::numeric, 5)*1e5)::integer as lat, to_char( tsdate at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI:SS"Z"' ) as date,
-- TIMERANGE 1::integer as timerange, 0::integer as p1, 900::integer as p2,
-- VARCODE 'B13011'::varchar as varcode,
-- VALUE per UOM case when (lower(ana.uom) like '%mm%') then round(dat.misura::numeric, 1)::double precision else null end as value,
-- LEVEL 1::integer as level1, null::integer as l1, null::integer as level2, null::integer as l2
from ( select dat.db, dat.sensore, case when substring(dat.orarioutc,4,2)::integer % 15 = 0 then to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp at time zone 'UTC' else to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||substring(dat.orarioutc,1,3)||'00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp at time zone 'UTC' + ((round(substring(dat.orarioutc,4,2)::numeric / 15. + 0.5, 0) * 15)::varchar||' minutes')::interval end as tsdate, sum(dat.misura) as misura
from public.dpcn_dati dat join ( select db, sensore from ( select dat.db, dat.sensore, extract(epoch from dat.date - max(dat_prec.date)) as freq_min from inner_dat dat left join inner_dat dat_prec on dat.db = dat_prec.db and dat.sensore = dat_prec.sensore and dat_prec.date < dat.date where dat_prec.date is not null group by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.date ) foo group by db, sensore having min(freq_min) < 900 ) frq on frq.sensore = dat.sensore and frq.db = dat.db
where dat.fileid = ${fileid.0} and dat.misura::numeric not in (-9999)
group by dat.db, dat.sensore, (case when substring(dat.orarioutc,4,2)::integer % 15 = 0 then to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||dat.orarioutc, 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp at time zone 'UTC' else to_timestamp(dat.giorno||' '||substring(dat.orarioutc,1,3)||'00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI')::timestamp at time zone 'UTC' + ((round(substring(dat.orarioutc,4,2)::numeric / 15. + 0.5, 0) * 15)::varchar||' minutes')::interval end) ) dat
join public.dpcn_anagrafica ana on ana.sensore = dat.sensore and ana.db = dat.db order by dat.db, dat.sensore, dat.tsdate;

processors.name: Read sensor data from DB - PLUVIO < 15 min

config.comments: in case of success of the ingestion delete the field "ms_errore" and "ts_errore" if there are any

entry.value: update public.dpcn_logfile set ts_errore = null, ms_errore = null where fileid = ${fileid.0} and ms_errore like '%DBALLE' or ms_errore like '%AMQP';

processors.name: Aggiorna log DELETE ERROR MESSAGE if any

entry.value: During the ingestion of file with id ${fileid.0} the following error happened: ${messaggio}.

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: update public.dpcn_logfile set ts_errore = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000), ms_errore = '${messaggio:replace("'","''")}' where fileid = ${fileid.0};
E013 errore nell'aggiornare il db dopo un'operazione di ingestion che ha avuto successo
select fileid,filename from public.dpcn_logfile where ms_errore like '%E004%' and filename = '202407261400.asc' limit 1;
select fileid,filename from public.dpcn_logfile where ms_errore like '%E004%' and ts_download is null limit 1;

processGroups.name: Retrieve files in ERR004 (unable to download the file)

entry.value: Listing from FTP: Lacking activity as of time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')}; flow has been inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
Listing from FTP: Activity restored at time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')} after being inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
DPCN Ingestion - the following error happened: ${messaggio}.

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)

entry.value: update public.dpcn_logfile set ts_errore = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000), ms_errore = '${messaggio:replace("'","''")}' where fileid = ${fileid.0};

delete from public.dpcn_logfile where (ts_delete is not null and substring(filename, 1, 12) < to_char((now() - interval '${MAX_DAYS_NIFI_LOGS} days') at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI')) or (filename = 'anag_mistral.csv' and ts_download is not null and ts_download < (now() - interval '${MAX_DAYS_NIFI_LOGS} days'));
update public.dpcn_logfile set ts_errore = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000), ms_errore = '${messaggio:replace("'","''")}' where fileid = ${fileid.0};

Fetching from FTP: Activity restored at time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')} after being inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes

entry.value: select fileid,filename from public.dpcn_logfile where filename like '%.asc%' and ts_download is not null and ts_ingestion is null order by filename limit 1;
During the ingestion of file with id ${fileid.0} the following error happened: ${messaggio}.

processors.name: Log error (to be read by the monitoring system)
Add service name and logfile name

entry.value: E006: Errore nell'inserimento dei dati su DB.

processors.name: change deliveryMode before sending to AMQP

entry.value: Lacking activity as of time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')}; flow has been inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
Activity restored at time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')} after being inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
During the ingestion of file with id ${fileid.0} the following error happened: ${messaggio}.

entry.value: E006b: Non stato possibile aggiornare log FILE.
E017 - Errore nell'estrarre i dati per il sensore ${tipo_sensore}

update public.dpcn_logfile set ts_delete = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000) where filename like '%.asc%' and ts_delete is null and substring(filename, 1, 12) < to_char((now() - interval '${MAX_DAYS_NIFI_DATA} days') at time zone 'UTC', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MI');
E012 Non possibile estrarre il fileid
Ingesting DPC data: Lacking activity as of time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')}; flow has been inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
Ingesting DPC data: Activity restored at time: ${now():format('yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss')} after being inactive for ${inactivityDurationMillis:toNumber():divide(60000)} minutes
E018 Errori nella conversione a jsonline
update public.dpcn_logfile set ts_errore = to_timestamp(${now():toNumber()}/1000), ms_errore = '${messaggio:replace("'","''")}' where fileid = ${fileid.0};
